titleStmt.title: The State of the case depending between some of the inhabitants of Thames street and Josiah Child touching Lion-key ...
titleStmt.author: Child, Josiah, Sir, 1631-1699.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Child was said to have blocked up the public right of way to the river at Lion quay and to have erected buildings unlawfully.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England).
